data.name: Babylons
data.description:
Babylons is the first truly community-owned and leading NFT marketplace on Binance Smart Chain sparking creative and engaging journeys in both virtual and real worlds. Babylons' business model inspires financial freedom, decentralized living, making arts, and meaningful social interaction.
NFT marketplace has been launched on BSC mainnet at the end of March 2021 after years of experiences in arts, technology, and blockchain spaces. Babylons became partners with the Ferrum Network incubation center publicly and will launch the governance token $BABI before Q3, 2021 takes off. In the meantime, there is a strong community behind Babylons and the platform is getting stronger day by day with the work that is put in as a team.

At the first glance, Babylons shines out as an NFT marketplace with low-cost minting, weekly rewards, and a DAO governance model that puts the ownership and the decisive power in the hands of the community. But let’s have a look at what Babylons platform allows people to do:
- Create their own NFTs
- Get their digital goods highlighted
- Sell their own NFT
- Buy and collect others’ NFTs
- Showcase their NFTs on a customized profile page
- Get verified as artists and collectors
- Get their commission payback simply by holding $BABI tokens
- Be eligible for weekly $BABI rewards by creating volume on the marketplace
- Manage features by using the future voting mechanism in the DAO governance model
- Set a percentage as a royalty for secondary sales allowing the creators to get their fair share from the added value on the second-hand market.
